DOC.brief_summary: This study use randomize controlled design evaluate whether youth entrepreneurship/life-skills intervention reservation-based American Indian adolescent ( age 13-15 ) improve psychosocial , behavioral health , educational , economic outcome baseline 3 year follow-up compare recreational sport league control condition .
DOC.detailed_description: Intervention activity hold 3 night/4 day residential camp 6 weekend workshop academic year . The control condition consist recreational sport league hold 3 Saturdays , also academic year .
DOC.criteria: American Indian ethnicity primary residence within Fort Apache Indian Reservation . Participants must 1315 year old , enrol student one participate high school , must parent/guardian consent participation study . Youth currently enrol foster care eligible participate study . Those unable participate evaluation assessment intervention component also exclude .
